name: 215G
description:
You've been trapped in a somber middle-space for as long as you can remember, and the only way out is to recreate a painful memory you've locked deep inside... MacOS version now available! Features:
  • A short, surreal adventure created in Unreal Engine 4
  • Artful environments and a dreadful, unnerving tone
  • Non-linear gameplay with light puzzle solving and/or casual objectives in each area
  • Creative use of Volumetric Fog and Lighting
Controls:
  • Standard WASD controls for movement
  • Left mouse button to interact
  • Left shift to sprint
  • Escape to quit
  • Gamepad control is supported
